main event: A sighting of an object moving rapidly in a zig-zag pattern was reported in Long Beach, California on 6 November 1957.
interesting points: The object disappeared and reappeared periodically., The sighting lasted for 12 minutes., The observation type was Ground-Radar Visual., The report speculated the object was possibly a balloon, aircraft, or astronomical phenomenon., The specific date-time of the observation was 2230 on 6 November 1957.
sighted object: one object moving in a zig-zag pattern
